creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
inscription:
Mark

On side are engraved the arms of Brown or Browne of Massachusetts.
markings:
maker's mark stamped on side: <J D> Roman capitals, a pellet between, a fleur-de-lis beneath in a heart-shaped shield
maker's mark on base: <J D> Roman capitals in an oval
title: Two-handled cup
